title: Apply a Customer Payment to Multiple Invoices
description: A customer sends a single payment to cover multiple outstanding invoices. An agent must apply the payment correctly.

tasks.description: Receive a payment from a customer with remittance advice listing the invoice numbers being paid.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the payment details and the list of invoices.

tasks.description: Retrieve all the specified open invoices for the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up all the correct invoices.

tasks.description: Apply the payment across the multiple invoices, closing them out.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully applies the payment and marks all the specified invoices as 'paid'.
